description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              Job Description
              
              We are looking for self-motivated, creative and proactive QA Engineers to work closely with our Project Managers and development teams to work in a fast-paced environment including multiple platforms, architectures and diverse technologies.
              

              Responsibilities:
              
              - Interact with project management and development teams to develop a strong understanding of the project and testing objectives.
              
              - Develop and execute functional tests as well as automated tests in order to deliver a high quality product.
              
              - Participate in troubleshooting and triaging of issues with different teams to drive towards root cause identification and resolution.
              
              - Document, track and escalate issues as appropriate.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              IDEAL PROFESSIONAL QUALIFICATIONS
              
              1.	QA Automation Engineers
              
              - Bachelors degree in C.S. or related technical discipline.
              
              - 2+ years work experience in development and/or testing role.
              
              - Must have automation experience using languages like Java, Python, Linux shell, Nodejs, etc
              
              - Must have automation experience with tools like Selenium, Jenkins, Jmeter, Android automator, Appium, Protractor, etc
              
              - Must have a strong knowledge of web services (REST API, SOAP UI).
              
              - Must have sound understanding of QA practices and principles including test case creation and management, Defect managements and metrics, etc.
              
              - Must have knowledge of Linux.
              
              - Must have Database skills with Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.
              
              - Experience of white box testing and debugging the following: Web based application, Back end server testing (Saas), Scalability and performance.
              
              - Understanding of Cloud/SaaS technology.
              
              - Understand of how to test a product for a mass market use consumers.
              
              - A Passion for quality.
              
              - Can do/Can ship attitude.
              
              - Good English verbal and written communication skills.
              

              2. QA Manual Engineers
              
              - Bachelors degree in C.S. or related technical discipline.
              
              - 2+ years work experience in development and/or testing role.
              
              - Must have technical background and a thorough understanding of software development engineering and methodologies.
              
              - Must have Database skills with Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.
              
              - Good experience with different Operating Systems.
              
              - Proven ability to manage and prioritize multiple, diverse projects simultaneously.
              
              - Must be careful, flexible, independent and self motivated.
              
              - Good English verbal and written communication skills.
              

              Desired qualifications but not required:
              
              - Knowledge of automated testing tools, like WinRunner, QTP, Rational Robot, JMeter, Soasta, Selenium, etc
              
              - Good understanding of common languages like VB, JAVA, PERL, C++, etc.
              
              - Use existing tools and techniques to execute test cases and build/script new tools for performing testing/validation function.
              

              IDEAL PERSONAL QUALIFICATIONS
              
              - Must have A Passion for quality. The candidate will be immersed in quality assurance and a strong understanding of how to apply this to an agile environment.
              
              - Must have High integrity, trustworthy operator that is intellectually honest yet a fundamental optimist, positive attitude.
              
              - Must have Self starter and natural leader, doesn’t wait for instructions once the objectives are clear.
              
              - Experience in both start ups and larger companies.
              
              - Passion for technology and/or mobile.
              
              - Commitment to high standards of excellence and integrity.
              

              * Benefits and Incentives
              
              - Competitive salary
              
              - Annual salary review
              
              - Overtime salary
              
              - 13-month salary
              
              - Project bonus
              
              - Laptop support policy
              
              - 02 days off (Sat and Sun) each week + 01 day leave per month
              
              - Excellent Benefits: holiday bonus, birthday gift, team building, health care examination, social insurance contribution according to high salary,…
              
              - Opportunity to travel to client sites in the Silicon Valley and other interesting locations
              
              - Dynamic and comfortable working environment.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                13th month Salary and Bonus
               







                Laptop Support Policy
